mapper.update: update address set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, aname = #{aname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, aphone = #{aphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amobile = #{amobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, aprovince = #{aprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, acity = #{acity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adistrict = #{adistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, azip = #{azip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, uid, aname, aphone, amobile, aprovince, acity, adistrict, address, azip, createtime, updatetime from address where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, uid, aname, aphone, amobile, aprovince, acity, adistrict, address, azip, createtime, updatetime from address
